thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 24 of 2268
thread.title: Sukran Mustafa

author: Sukran Mustafa
title: Sukran Mustafa
text: I carried out research on line and spoke to Blinds 2Go for advise etc. Everything they said was very helpful. I also had several samples prior to ordering which helped me in my final decision. I was quite concerned not to make an error as one of my windows was a large angled bay. I carefully followed the instructions both for measuring and fitting. However, the instructions states to allow 6mm more when fitting the brackets. I did that on the single window, but felt it was too much, so I left about 3mm on the others. They're excellent value for money and they look quite eye catching both inside the home and from street view. I will soon be ordering more for my living room.
